"""
This script displays information about redirects in the table above.

Use this script to identify potential redirects that for example leak information.
"""
from burp import IParameter

# Do the initial setup
if ref ==1 or "exclude_parameters" not in session:
	header = ["Ref.", "Host", "URL", "Params", "Location Params", "Status Code", "Content Length", "Response Size", "Location"]
	session["exclude_parameters"] = [IParameter.PARAM_COOKIE]

# Process only in-scope HTTP responses
response = message_info.getResponse()
if in_scope and response:
	response_info = helpers.analyzeResponse(response)
	status_code = response_info.getStatusCode()
	parameters = [item for item in request_info.getParameters() if item.getType() not in session["exclude_parameters"]]
	content_length = get_content_length(response_info.getHeaders())
	_, location = get_header(response_info.getHeaders(), "Location")
	if location:
		location_params = []
		for parameter in parameters:
			raw_paramter = helpers.urlDecode(parameter.getValue())
			raw_location = helpers.urlDecode(location)
			if raw_paramter in raw_location:
				location_params.append(parameter.getName())
		rows.append([ref, get_hostname(url), url.getPath(), len(parameters) > 0, ", ".join(location_params), status_code, content_length if content_length else -1, len(response), location])
